Field.Description: RCI threshold of egress core fifo
Field.Name: EGRESS_RCI_THRESHOLD

Field.Description: RCI threshold of total egress fifos (both cores)
Field.Name: TOTAL_EGRESS_RCI_THRESHOLD

Field.Description: Factor to use for link RCI
Field.Name: LINK_RCI_FACTOR

Field.Description: Minimum number of links with highest RCI level which leads to High Severity indication
Field.Name: MIN_NOF_LINKS

Field.Description: RCI score when High Severity indicated
Field.Name: SCORE

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_CGM_RCI_SCORE_TO_LEVEL_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Thresholds to convert scores to final RCI levels

Field.Description: Threshold to convert core score to final RCI level
Field.Name: CORE_THRESHOLD

Field.Description: Threshold to convert device score to final RCI level
Field.Name: DEVICE_THRESHOLD

Field.Description: The maximum value the leaky bucket may reach
Field.Name: MAX_VALUE

Field.Description: The threshold above which the leaky bucket is considered congested
Field.Name: THRESHOLD

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_CGM_GCI_LEAKY_BUCKET_FC_ENABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Enable/Disable GCI Leaky Buckets flow controls

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_CGM_GCI_BACKOFF_CONGESTION_SEVERITY_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure Backoff congestion severity level by setting thresholds on the congestion severity (which is a running average of the incoming GCI indications)

Field.Description: GCI Backoff congestion severity level threshold id
Field.Name: LEVEL_SEPARATE

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_CGM_GCI_BACKOFF_CONGESTION_SEVERITY_WEIGHTS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure GCI Backoff congestion severity weights

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_CGM_GCI_BACKOFF_TIMER_MAX
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure maximum value for random Backoff timer

Field.Description: Rate level phase (slow-start requires 2 intermediate rate-levels)
Field.Name: PHASE

Field.Description: Exponent for the max random time this rate will last
Field.Name: TIMER_PERIOD

Field.Description: Delay part of shaper's rate configuration
Field.Name: DELAY

Field.Description: Calendar part of shaper's rate configuration
Field.Name: CALENDAR

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_CGM_ING_TRANSMIT_PER_CORE_SHAPERS_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Ingress Transmit Shapers configurations. Enable FMC shapers in order to user them for Slow Start

Field.Description: Shaper's delay (the shaper rate is determined by calendar and delay) [2Clocks]
Field.Name: DELAY

Field.Description: Shaper's calendar (the shaper rate is determined by calendar and delay) [Bytes]
Field.Name: CALENDAR

Field.Description: Max burst size the shaper may accumulate [Bytes]
Field.Name: MAX_BURST

Field.Description: Shaper's decrease factor (in response to flow control from the DTQs)
Field.Name: DCR_FACTOR

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_CGM_LLFC_ENABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Enable/Disable LLFC in FMAC per link

Field.Description: The threshold at which to activate LLFC
Field.Name: THRESHOLD

Field.Description: Threshold to drop cells with priority
Field.Name: THRESHOLD

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_CGM_EGRESS_FIFO_FC_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Egress FIFOs flow control toward link FIFOs thresholds

Field.Description: Flow Control Threshold for pipe's FIFO
Field.Name: THRESHOLD

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_CGM_EGRESS_FIFO_FC_AGING_PERIOD
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Egress FIFOs flow control toward link FIFOs aging period

Field.Description: Output stage FIFO size per link
Field.Name: LINK_FIFO_SIZE_THRESHOLD

Field.Description: Threshold for the egress dynamic WFQ. The threshold cause the dynamic WFQ to use the 'congested' configurations.
Field.Name: THRESHOLD

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_CGM_EGRESS_DROP_TDM_LATENCY
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Drop TDM cells if latency is too high

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_CGM_EGRESS_DROP_LOW_PRIO_MC
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Drop low priority multicast cells at egress

Field.Description: Threshold for dropping low priority multicast
Field.Name: THRESHOLD

Field.Description: Is multicast priority considered as low priority
Field.Name: IS_LOW_PRIORITY

Field.Description: Shaper's calendar (the shaper rate is determined by calendar and delay) [32Bytes]
Field.Name: CALENDAR

Field.Description: Shaper's delay (the shaper rate is determined by calendar and delay) [Clocks]
Field.Name: DELAY
